workflow.name: Poetry
workflow.description: Write lines of a poem that rhyme

tasks.name: Line 1
tasks.instructions: Think up the first line of a poem about the subject input. Include only the line of the poem in your response.

tasks.name: Line 2
tasks.instructions: Think up the second line of the poem about the subject input. Include only the line of the poem in your response.

tasks.name: Line 3
tasks.instructions: Think up the last line of the poem about the subject input. Include only the line of the poem in your response.
